website_summaries.verdict: Comes with a sophisticated HD touchscreen and upgraded technology for many uses.
pros: Comes with a 10-hour battery life that is optimal for a full day of classes or long nights in the library
Optimized enhancements for modern day communication and entertainment
Current customers report high marks regarding speed and adaptive program support
cons: Form factor is a bit heavy

customer_reviews.title: All around awesome machine, but heavier than others.
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy for my preference. It does have a bigger screen, so it makes up for it. Also, it seems like is large enough to have a ten key, but they didn't include it. Everything else about this computer is awesome. It's fast and very comfortable to type on and runs programs without issues. Not too much bloatware either. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Corey J. Poland

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is now my every day at home use computer. The only problem that I have is the hinge is still a bit stiff, I think this will fix itself over time. I am very happy I picked this Lap T op.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work. It retains the battery life pretty well - 8 hours or so working on it all day. I got the pen to go with it. The keyboard allows me to adjust the volume and screen brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the price, SSD is fast, plenty of RAM and processing power for normal use. I've done a bit of CAD and programming on it and it works great. Anything super intensive would need a more powerful computer but this laptop is great if you don't need it to be a full fledged work station. Screen is good except for the glare. Build quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problems after Windows Updates
customer_reviews.text: I set up the finger print login and didn't note my typed password. Shortly after a required major system upgrade, the finger print login was erased and not remembering my typed password, I ended having to reset the laptop. Took me a week of research and trial and error before I was able to login. Then I found this upgrade had locked screen brightness at full. I don't recall how I got around that but it took about a week again of research. Everything else is so far fine but I didn't realize I was purchasing major hassles after these upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: ATD

customer_reviews.title: Flickering black screen Lenovo Flex 5
customer_reviews.text: I bought Lenovo flex 5 on April 2, 2018 and after 5 months the screen started flickering which is very annoying. I don't know what to do and feel a waste of my money. I'm going to try to get this returned to the manufacturer if I could. I've been making it work despite of the flickering the moment I get on this. It looks like hardware issue but I'm not going to mess around with this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Joya Malla

customer_reviews.title: Great looks, portable, fast.
customer_reviews.text: SSD provides fast start up with quick processing. Perfect for a young student doing homework, streaming media, web browsing. Thin, light and attractive. Doesn't scream "budget" like some comparable laptops. Been great so far for my high schooler.
customer_reviews.author: chris l.

customer_reviews.title: It's grown on me
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too thrilled at first but after getting used to it I've come to like it. It's really too big and heavy to be considered a tablet, and the somewhat condensed keyboard takes some getting used to, but it's been reliable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied. Very fast!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews. However after 2 years of using this computer I have to say that I am very satisfied with the quality of this product. I have had no problems this far with the exception that the touch screen feature is not working anymore. However this could have something to do with one of the drivers settings not being set correctly. Other than that I am very happy with this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great for work and school!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend because she always rents one from her school, and the ones the school loans out are pretty dated. This is perfect for keeping up with her projects and work assignments. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: almost like new. i like it.
customer_reviews.text: I work in IT, that makes a difference when purchasing used equipment. I got it, opened it up and the board looked like new. I put the hard drive i wanted in. I made a hole lot of changes including in the bios and how it loads. If you don`t know how to do these things some stuff my not work like the camera for example. Had to get a lot of new updates. It`s worth is so far. I`ve had it about a week. (that`s how log it took for me to set it up the way that suits me.)
customer_reviews.author: j saunders

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the Flex. It's fast, great screen, perfect size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Screen died after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: The screen wont turn on anymore after less than a years worth or light use. The rest of the laptop runs fine when connected to an external display. I've been very happy with it until now
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop and the features - touchscreen, foldable into a tablet, solid state hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Chinen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately a terrible Lenovo product! It started freezing after 2 months. After 4 months I have trouble even turning it on. It works for about 10 minutes, freezes completely and I am forced to turn it off with the power button. The power button itself often doesn't react at all. Lenovo will not issue a refud or exchange, they will oly guide you through a drive reset. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen has bumps and friction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom, and was upset to find that the touch screen was bumpy and had a lot of friction.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect computer for running a business while on the road
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for traveling while running my travel business on the road. With Office 365 I have one set if files at the office or anywhere in the world. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Bruce T. Tuten

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen quit working after 90 days.  Seller does not respond.
customer_reviews.text: It started out to be a great laptop for $600.00. The fingerprint reader won't work for one of us but it does the other. Now the touch screen won't work. Its been just 89 days! We tried to contact the seller but no response. What will go next?
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: I've had this computer for about 6 months now and have no complaints. Everything works great
customer_reviews.author: Matty Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great computer, very good responsive seller, quick delivery.
customer_reviews.text: As a mostly mac girl, i was impressed with the qualities of this laptop. Very snazzy, with great audio and crisp bright color. Being unfamiliar with the OS I find its pretty usuer friendly and has vast capabilities. I am very thrilled with this computer. Thank you to the seller. Nice!!
customer_reviews.author: pamela malette

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I used it during a flight for movies worked perfect and also fold
customer_reviews.author: Shaul S.

customer_reviews.title: The most important thing is the speed of the SSD can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful item will recommend I brought this for my son and He really really enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: Duche

customer_reviews.title: Good value laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, a nice, clean, modern design and the screen is really nice. It's very quick to boot. Love the fingerprint sensor and new Lenovo touchpad features too. Speakers are fine for a mid range laptop, nothing special but still perfectly fine. Plenty of modern features for a laptop in this price range too
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: A good mirror. A bad laptop! It has by far the worst glare I've ever seen on a laptop
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Lenovo fan for years because their more expensive laptops come with beautiful matte or anti-glare screens. This laptop however is not just glossy. It is more of a mirror than a laptop. I can see my reflection in the screen when it is at full brightness! It may be OK if you only work in a dim room with no windows and no bright lights.
customer_reviews.author: Magus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic laptop. No regrets at all. Product received as expected. Excellent seller.
customer_reviews.author: Engine

customer_reviews.title: ... computer arrived on time without a problem and performs fantastic. Our son loves it for college
customer_reviews.text: the computer arrived on time without a problem and performs fantastic. Our son loves it for college.
customer_reviews.author: HM3

customer_reviews.title: This laptop is junk!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is a piece of junk! I have had it just long enough that Amazon says, "the product the turn window is closed"! I will be calling them to have a conversation about this. I purchased it mostly for editing photos and transferring them to my separate hard drive for archiving. Many programs have crashed and the quality of images for editing is terrible! I wouldn't recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Nygaard

customer_reviews.title: Useless laptop - Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop for my daughter to use for work and for virtual schooling for my grandsons during the Covid-19 pandemic. At first it worked great, then the dreaded black screen and would not come on. I had purchased the extended warranty, but it does not apply until after the factory warranty has expired. She called Lenovo and was advised there was nothing they could do as there was no one to repair the unit, and to contact a local repair facility. There is no repair facility in her area, so she has a useless piece of junk. I purchased this because I thought Lenovo was a reputable company with quality products, was I ever wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen stopped working after a windows update.
customer_reviews.text: After a windows update the touch screen stopped working. The seller directed me to the manufacturer to look for a fix. The manufacturer gave me 5 possible solutions but none have worked. Turns out this is a common issue with this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Screen got a crack on it even with careful handling. Screen then wouldn't stop flickering. I had to buy a separate monitor which worked well for a little bit, but now there's something wrong with the HDMI port. The cable feels loose and the pins (or whatever it is that makes contact these days) constantly lose contact causing my portable monitor to flicker and turn on/off if I shift the laptop even slightly. Bottom lid also started bulging out to the point where I can't completely screw it shut, so some of the internal parts exposed. I've only had this laptop a few months. Never dropped or mishandled. Never buying Lenovo again
customer_reviews.author: Rook12de

customer_reviews.title: This laptop is junk
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I bought this laptop. I have used Lenovo products in the past - key point past - and found them to be great. This model was problematic from the start. First I had to pay about $100 to get the bloatware removed. Second, the cursor started jumping around whenever I type. This happens constantly. I researched the issue and head read that it is caused by low quality frames for laptops. Third, programs randomly open and close. This does not happen as much as issue two, but it is still annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Steve from Maine

customer_reviews.title: Noisiest laptop alive...................
customer_reviews.text: Listen up...............ssd's heat up very quick when lots of data is being transferred. windows 10 is constantly trying to upgrade, which means this laptop sounds like a jet ready for take-off. It even tries to upgrade when I've directed the puter to not upgrade during active hours. So, is this about technology........or lenovo trying to generating revenue? The future looks pretty dim. Good luck & take care.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate it with passion! It gets in my nerves how difficult is to turn this piece of S on, even trying to get it out of sleep mode. It has a mind of it own it gets super slow with no reason. I wish I could just smash it and have money to buy another one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Screen is too reflective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the i7 version of this laptop about a month ago. It is fast. and build solidly. However, no matter how great the specs are and how responsive it is, if you can't see the screen , it is useless. I called tech support for Lenovo a couple of times with no success. First tech tried to repair it with no success, and the second tech just said return it because that's the way the screens on these laptops are designed. It is so reflective that it is a serious strain to work for more than a few minutes in a lite room and it cannot be seen at all in sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Delfina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop out right now.
customer_reviews.text: This has a tough, industrial feel but still looks good. Its a no nonsense machine that gets the job done right. Great combination of specs and a hinge that actually works if you want to go into tablet mode. I get this for my clients and my own family.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hay

customer_reviews.title: does not have PCIe M.2 as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Is this a nice fast computer yes! and great build quality. I love it, however it does NOT contain an M.2 PCIe SSD. it has a SATA SSD, and thus is slower. What boggles my mind is that lenovo reps answer question about the SSD incorrectly as well, stating its a M.2 PCIe. So, great computer, but not what I was sold.
customer_reviews.author: collin miller

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Unlike many other manufacturers for a 4k laptop the price is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Reluctant Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is light and has a huge screen with decent graphics that is perfect for work or streaming movies. Setup is extremely easy, you get guided by Cortana's voice through the process. After you setup an account you will be free to use your new laptop however you want. It has a an Intel Core i5 8th Gen processor that delivers quick online searches and streaming.
customer_reviews.author: Y. C. M.

product_meta.title: Lenovo Flex 5 15.6-Inch 2-in-1 Laptop, (Intel Core i5-8250U 8GB DDR4 256GB PCIe SSD Windows 10) 81CA0008US

feature_bullets: STUNNING FHD DISPLAY: Laptop has a Full HD (15.6") IPS touchscreen display, so you’ll be able to watch movies and browse the web in vivid detail from nearly every angle;No numeric keyboard

FINGERPRINT READER: Log in to your Flex 5 laptop instantly and securely with our fingerprint reader, and with the support of Windows Hello, you can make secure purchases at participating retailers with one touch of your finger.

POWERFUL PROCESSOR: Equipped with the latest 8th Gen Intel processor and a 256GB PCIe SSD, this 2 in 1 laptop has lightning fast boot-ups and transfer times, plus plenty of memory for more apps and large files without the slow down.

TOUCHSCREEN LAPTOP: Turn thoughts into action with the new Windows Ink features that let you write, type, and touch directly on your laptop; pair with the Lenovo Active Pen (available separately) which emulates a natural pen-on-paper writing experience.
LONG-LASTING BATTERY: This 15-inch laptop has an epic 10 hour battery life to fuel a day full of creativity without worrying about finding a charging station.
